title: Haruka Tooki Kuni no Monogatari
sinopse:
Once upon a time, in the far east, in a land called Persia, there's a princess called Anis Janis, and she is the one who get a hold of the magical lamp.

Heavily influenced by the story of 1001 nights, princess Anis Janis is not the Damsel in distress, instead she enjoys going outside her palace, along with her close associates for adventure. Sometimes she venture outside her palace voluntarily, to help people or for fun and sometimes she is force to leave her place against her will.

In the first volume, she got kidnapped from her palace during the night and is transformed into a cat. What should she do to return to her human form?
